function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased need for reforming urban governance due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for ineffective response to future pandemics","Mitigation":"Implementing adaptive governance models and collaborative approaches","Technologies":"Smart technologies for monitoring, data analysis, and decision support","People":"Urban residents, policymakers, city administrators","Owner":"City governments, urban planners, technology companies"},{"Description":"Uncertainty of stability of recent urban governance innovations","Impact":"Risk of ineffective response to future disasters or disruptions","Mitigation":"Conducting ongoing evaluations and adapting governance models as needed","Technologies":"Data analytics, scenario modeling, risk assessment tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, city governments"},{"Description":"Differentiated smart urban governance based on context and urban challenges","Impact":"Potential for mismatched governance solutions to specific urban challenges","Mitigation":"Tailoring governance models to specific urban contexts and challenges","Technologies":"Customized data platforms, contextual data analysis tools","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, technology companies","Owner":"City governments, technology companies"}]}
